text:
The macrodef page of the Ant manual for 1.7.0 has a BETA watermark all over it.
Aside from the fact that 1.7.0 is no longer in BETA, the watermark is intrusive
enough that it makes the page really hard for me to read.
creator: rick.genter@gmail.com
peterreilly@apache.org
text: This is fixed in svn, the new manual will be published with ant 1.7.1
